column3: Boy was this place awesome I am big on history and learning about this place was awesome. The kids loved it here.

The Children's Museum is a worthwhile detour if you have children and are touring the downtown Los Angeles. It was a favorite destination when my daughter was a little one for Sue. I stopped by recently and found it still to be a worthwhile kiddie haven. Take the kids there! ...

Hands on for the children was a hit!Close up and friendly atmosphere. The children were able to discuss there enjoyment with each other and exchange what they had seen and what others may have missed.
